name: PowerCenter:Avoid using external transformation
output:
This report lists all Mappings, Mapplets and Folders with external Transformations. 
it provides the following information
Mapping or Mapplet or Folder full name, external Transformations full name
rationale: The usage of external transformation is a specific feature provided inside PowerCenter to handle very specific and complex transformation (loop, parsing, etc.). It is recommended to use  first all the native functionalities of PowerCenter as the external transformation will be less performant  and maintenable.
remediation: Use whenever possible native PowerCenter transformation.
total: Total number of Mappings, Mapplets and Folders
